validation.notEmpty: The value must not be empty
validation.beNumber: The value must be a number
validation.beWholeNumber: The value must be a whole number
validation.beBoolean: The value must be true or false
validation.beDate: The value must be a date
validation.beDateTime: The value must be a date/time
validation.beTime: The value must be a time
validation.beMilliseconds: The value must be a timestamp in milliseconds
validation.beSeconds: The value must be a timestamp in seconds
validation.beObject: The value must be an object
validation.beArray: The value must be an array
validation.beArrayValue: The value must be an array with at least one item
validation.beByteArray: The value must be a byte array
validation.beUrn: The value must be a correctly formatted urn
validation.beUrl: The value must be a correctly formatted url
validation.beJSON: The value must be correctly formatted JSON
validation.beEmail: The value must be a correctly formatted e-mail address

guard.string: Property "{property}" must be a string, it is "{value}"
guard.stringEmpty: Property "{property}" must have a value, it is empty
guard.stringHex: Property "{property}" must be a hex string, it is "{value}"
guard.stringHexLength: Property "{property}" must be a hex string of length "{options}", it is "{value}"
guard.number: Property "{property}" must be a number, it is "{value}"
guard.integer: Property "{property}" must be an integer, it is "{value}"
guard.boolean: Property "{property}" must be a boolean, it is "{value}"
guard.date: Property "{property}" must be a date, it is "{value}"
guard.milliseconds: Property "{property}" must be a timestamp in milliseconds, it is "{value}"
guard.seconds: Property "{property}" must be a timestamp in seconds, it is "{value}"
guard.objectUndefined: Property "{property}" must be an object, it is "undefined"
guard.object: Property "{property}" must be an object, it is "{value}"
guard.objectValue: Property "{property}" must be an object, with at least one property, it is "{value}"
guard.array: Property "{property}" must be an array, it is "{value}"
guard.arrayValue: Property "{property}" must be an array with at least one item
guard.arrayOneOf: Property "{property}" must be one of [{options}], it is "{value}"
guard.uint8Array: Property "{property}" must be a Uint8Array, it is "{value}"
guard.function: Property "{property}" must be a function, it is "{value}"
guard.urn: Property "{property}" must be a Urn formatted string, it is "{value}"
guard.url: Property "{property}" must be a Url formatted string, it is "{value}"
guard.email: Property "{property}" must be string in e-mail format, it is "{value}"

common.notImplementedMethod: The method "{method}" has not been implemented
